rules_text:
Hexproof
[i]Augmented[/i] – At the beginning of each end step, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, untap up to three permanents. Then you may shuffle your hand into your library. If you do, draw three cards.
flavor_text:
[i]“Turn your back on mother nature.”
—Mech Inscription[/i]
notes: Everybody Wants to Rule the World — Tears for Fears
